```{r library, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
  library(tidyverse)
  library(gridExtra)
  library(knitr)
  library(forcats)  #meow
```

```{r global_options, include=FALSE}
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path='figures/', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, cache=FALSE)
```

# Load files

* Load metadata

```{r load_data}
  samples <- readRDS("../r_files/lab_meta.RDS")
  times <- readRDS("../r_files/lab_segment_times.RDS")
```

* functions

```{r load_functions}
  source("../r_scripts/plots.R")
```

# Clean lab metadata

# times

```{r}
  times <- 
    times %>%
    tidyr::gather("var", "val", 3:20) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(val = ifelse(as.character(val) == "NA", NA, val)) %>%
    dplyr::filter(!is.na(val))
```

# Plot metadata

## Test grid

```{r test_grid, fig.width=12, fig.height=10, echo=FALSE}
  test_list <- samples %>%
               dplyr::group_by(stove, fuel) %>%
               dplyr::summarise(id = paste(id, collapse = "\n"))

  plot_test_list(test_list, x_var = "stove", y_var = "fuel", id = "id", fill_color = "fuel")
```

## Stove-fuel combinations

```{r stove_fuel_hist, fig.width=12, fig.height=8, echo=FALSE}
  p1 <- plot_meta_hist(df = samples, var = "stove")

  p2 <- plot_meta_hist(df = samples, var = "fuel")

  grid.arrange(p1, p2, ncol = 2)
```

```{r save_meta}
  saveRDS(times, "../r_files/lab_segments.RDS")
```
